titles.title: Crop Insurance Subsidy Reduction Act of 2013
A bill to amend the Federal Crop Insurance Act to reduce Federal crop insurance subsidies, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: 3/5/2013--Introduced. Crop Insurance Subsidy Reduction Act of 2013 - Amends the Federal Crop Insurance Act to reduce crop insurance premium subsidy rates.
